member.name: F:Ceptara.Wunderlist.Client._appKeys
member.summary: Container for accessing the keys issued by the Wunderlist Developer web client

member.name: T:Ceptara.Wunderlist.Client.enuCacheMethod
member.summary: The surgical method deletes only the Wunderlist cookies, the sledgeHammer method clears all cookies.

member.name: P:Ceptara.Wunderlist.Client.AccessToken
member.summary: The oAuthAccessToken including the accessToken string and the issued and expiration dates.

member.name: P:Ceptara.Wunderlist.Client.ClearCacheMethod
member.summary: Gets/Sets the method used to manage the cookie cache.
member.remarks: .net WebBrowser component uses the IE cache. The surgical method deletes only the Wunderlist cookies, the sledgeHammer method clears all cookies and the proactive method avoids using cookies all together.

member.name: P:Ceptara.Wunderlist.Client.AccessTokenStored
member.summary: The accessToken returned by the service.

member.name: P:Ceptara.Wunderlist.Client.AuthCode
member.summary: the oAuth code used to retrieve the access token.

member.name: P:Ceptara.Wunderlist.Client.RestInterface
member.summary: REST Helper class - used for authorizing a user.

member.name: M:Ceptara.Wunderlist.Client.#ctor
member.summary: Constructs a basic Client
member.remarks: Need to set the AccessToken property to connect to the Wunderlist service.

member.name: M:Ceptara.Wunderlist.Client.#ctor(Ceptara.Wunderlist.AppConfig)
member.summary: Constructs a client using the specific configuration

member.name: M:Ceptara.Wunderlist.Client.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Constructs a client using a Json string representing a Client.oAuthAccessToken object instance

member.name: M:Ceptara.Wunderlist.Client.#ctor(Ceptara.Wunderlist.Client.oAuthAccessToken)
member.summary: Constructs a client using an oAuthAccessToken

member.name: M:Ceptara.Wunderlist.Client.#ctor(Ceptara.Wunderlist.AppConfig,Ceptara.Wunderlist.Client.oAuthAccessToken)
member.summary: Constructs a client using a specified application configuration (ClientID, ClientSecret, CallBackURL) and oAuthAccessToken (if new use blank, other used saved AccessToken)

member.name: M:Ceptara.Wunderlist.Client.Connect
member.summary: Establishes a connection to the service using the calling user's credentials.
member.remarks: Stores an access token to be used in subsequent calls.

member.name: M:Ceptara.Wunderlist.Client.IsTokenValid
member.summary: Returns True if the current saved token is still valid.,

member.name: M:Ceptara.Wunderlist.Client.ForceUserLogin
member.summary: Calls this method before calling the Connect method to force the user to enter his/her Wunderlist credentials

member.summary: Clears the cookie cache

member.summary: Retrieve the currently logged in user's profile information

member.summary: Returns a collection of lists from the service.

member.summary: Returns the specified list.

member.summary: Creates a new list on the service.

member.summary: Updates a list's title

member.summary: Removes the specified list from the service
member.param: String: Uniqued id for the list

member.name: M:Ceptara.Wunderlist.Client.GetTasks(System.String)
member.summary: Retrieves the active tasks from the specified list.
member.remarks: Does not get the 'completed' tasks - use GetTasks(list_id, completed) query to return the completed tasks.

member.name: M:Ceptara.Wunderlist.Client.GetTasks(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Retrieves the complete or incomplete tasks from the specified list.

member.summary: Retrieves the specified task from the service.

member.summary: Adds a new task to the list specified by the insTask parameter

member.name: M:Ceptara.Wunderlist.Client.UpdateTask(Ceptara.Wunderlist.Task)
member.summary: Updates an existing task using the properties specified in the updTask parameter

member.name: M:Ceptara.Wunderlist.Client.RemoveTask(System.String,System.Int64)
member.summary: Removes the specified task from the service
member.param: String: Uniqued id for the task

member.name: M:Ceptara.Wunderlist.Client.GetTaskNotes(System.String)
member.summary: Retrieves the notes for the specified task.
member.remarks: API v1 supports only one note per task

member.name: M:Ceptara.Wunderlist.Client.GetNote(System.String)
member.summary: Retrieves the specified note from the service.

member.summary: Adds a new note to the specified task
member.remarks: API v1 supports only one note per task - returns 422 when trying to add more than one note.

member.name: M:Ceptara.Wunderlist.Client.UpdateNote(Ceptara.Wunderlist.Note)
member.summary: Updates an existing note using the properties specified in the updNote parameter

member.summary: Removes the specified note from the service
member.param: String: Unique id for the note

member.remarks: Raises ItemUpdated when completed.

member.summary: Removes the specified note from the service
member.param: String: Unique id for the note
member.remarks: Raises ItemDeleted when completed.

member.name: M:Ceptara.Wunderlist.Client.CleanFileName(System.String,System.String)

member.summary: Returns the last Try/Catch exception

member.name: P:Ceptara.Wunderlist.Client.RESTHelper.ResponseCookies

member.name: P:Ceptara.Wunderlist.Client.RESTHelper.RequestCookies
member.summary: Collection of the cookies from the last web response.
